title: Harissa roasted sweet potato and carrot soup
directions: mix coconut oil with harissa paste and salt
toss mixture with vegetables and roast for 15 minutes on baking sheet
add onion and roast for 10 minutes more
place coconut milk and 1.5 cups of broth into a blender, add vegetables and puree until smooth
can thin it with more broth if desired
stir in more harissa and salt if needed
set over medium heat and stir until hot
garnish with cilantro and lime juice
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and cut into 1-inch chunks
chopped cilantro and lime wedges, optional
